name: Wall of Holes
description:
Easy to learn, hard to master.
You control only the vertical movement of each side of the bar.
Can you roll the ball into the correct hole while avoiding all the others?
Warning: This is a tricky and addictive game... one wrong move and it's over!

+ Free to play, No IAP
+ Infinite generated levels
+ Loads of ball skins to unlock
+ Compete with friends' high scores
+ Complete challenges
+ Power-ups and gems to collect
+ Daily rewards
